title: Does the iPhone 7 heat up with iOS 13? - Quora

response.answer_text: Any iPhone wil lheat up with usage and the environment, or while charging or using it heavily. If your iPhone is excessively hot during normal usage, that’s an issue. I would recommend trying low power mode, restoring the iPhone or taking it to Apple to get looked at. Is your iPhone 7 getting hot under normal usage in iOS 13?
